casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Grant Leon TURNER. No. 359P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of July 2007 by Defendant for Recusal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
